reviews.review: What a lovely little masterpiece this is.
Everyone needs to play this game!

help my  master dong is currently at the other side of the chamber!

What a fun game, this game is one worth playing and worth buying. The winter and christmas sale especially goes for really cheap, it's such a good price for what the game contains. I really love how much content is in Portal 2. Recommend buying and playing portal 1 and portal 2, but start on portal 1 (it's super short compared to portal 2) and gives you a jist as well to what the story is before you play portal 2. Overally though, Portal 2 is great fun to play. Many puzzles although some try and be sneaky and sneak stuff in at last minute. But, it's a great fun to play. Recommend to play!
its a brilliant puzzle game with a well thought out story
Amazing sequel to the original Portal game, if you haven't played it yet... DO IT ALREADY IT'S GREAT!!!
Obra prima em forma de jogo v2.
good luck finding where to go
Juegazo, graficos decentes, puzzles magnificos y risas aseguradas con compa√±eros. Horas de diversi√≥n y rejugabilidad interesante. El workshop ayuda.
Pretty fun game. Really takes the plot of the original portal and pushes in a good direction. One of the few sequels that I can say can even be better than the original.
Even though I only played the game this year and I'm relatively new to gaming I would 100% recommend this to anyone, it is amazing.
Portal 2 is one of the best Puzzle games of the last century. The story never gets old and the humor is very good.

Gameplay - 10/10
The puzzles are fun and can get quite challenging at times, which only makes them more fun. They are always new, apart from the first few that are the same to the first few Portal 1 levels, but that is on purpose and the levels have had quite a big visual change.

Story - 10/10
The story is very good and the characters are funny (specifically Wheatley, who is voiced by Stephen Merchant). The story has a nice twist in the middle and some comedic humour added in at the correct times. The levels and puzzles are twisted nicely into the story and actually have relevance. 

Co-op - 7/10
The co-op experience is good and its the only game that me and my friend like consistently playing (at the time of writing).

Performance - 10/10
I could probably run this on a Microsoft Surface Tablet thing as my friend ran it on his 'craptop' as a consistent 20-30fps on low settings. But, I dunno what i expected tbh as its from 2011.

Graphics - 8/10
Not quite on par with games like Horizon Zero Dawn or Red Dead Redemption 2... obviously, bcoz its from 2011. But if Valve Release Portal 3 with these graphics today, i would be happy.

Overall, I recommend this game to anyone who hasn't played it yet.
Probably the best puzzle game i've played. Not only is the story great, the multiplayer is also extremly fun to play with friends.
Um otimo game para quem gosta de pensar um pouquinho em vez de esfregar as teclas

Portal 2 continues and enriches deeply the story of Portal, especially the ending is amazing. In addition, the co-operative mode is extremely challenging and very fun to play with friends. I would highly recommended it even if the game had only the co-op mode.
Yes good old game but good game only if portal 1 already but get now good fun experience for playing. SCI - FI Also get Rocket League
hell yes you should play this game. The puzzles are 10x harder this go around but it is so satisfying when you figure them out. Play it.
